[Tool: Write] {"file_path":"C:/Users/joshl/date-app/docker/docker-compose.yml","content":"version: '3.8'

services:
  # PostgreSQL Database
  postgres:
    image: postgres:16-alpine
    container_name: dateapp-postgres
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      POSTGRES_USER: ${POSTGRES_USER:-dateapp}
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:?POSTGRES_PASSWORD is required}
      POSTGRES_DB: ${POSTGRES_DB:-dateapp}
      PGDATA: /var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata
    ports:
      - "${POSTGRES_PORT:-5432}:5432"
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
      - ./init-scripts:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d:ro
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U ${POSTGRES_USER:-dateapp} -d ${POSTGRES_DB:-dateapp}"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5
      start_period: 30s
    networks:
      - dateapp-network

  # Redis Cache & Session Store
  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    container_name: dateapp-redis
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: redis-server --appendonly yes --requirepass ${REDIS_PASSWORD:?REDIS_PASSWORD is required}
    ports:
      - "${REDIS_PORT:-6379}:6379"
    volumes:
      - redis_data:/data
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "redis-cli", "-a", "${REDIS_PASSWORD}", "ping"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5
      start_period: 10s
    networks:
      - dateapp-network

  # Ollama - Llama AI Service
  ollama:
    image: ollama/ollama:latest
    container_name: dateapp-ollama
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "${OLLAMA_PORT:-11434}:11434"
    volumes:
      - ollama_data:/root/.ollama
    environment:
      - OLLAMA_HOST=0.0.0.0
      - OLLAMA_ORIGINS=*
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "curl -f http://localhost:11434/api/tags || exit 1"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 60s
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          devices:
            - driver: nvidia
              count: all
              capabilities: [gpu]
    networks:
      - dateapp-network

  # Node.js Backend API
  backend:
    build:
      context: ../backend
      dockerfile: ../docker/Dockerfile.backend
      args:
        NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
    container_name: dateapp-backend
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
      PORT: 3001
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-dateapp}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dateapp}?schema=public
      REDIS_URL: redis://:${REDIS_PASSWORD}@redis:6379
      REDIS_HOST: redis
      REDIS_PORT: 6379
      REDIS_PASSWORD: ${REDIS_PASSWORD}
      JWT_SECRET: ${JWT_SECRET:?JWT_SECRET is required}
      JWT_REFRESH_SECRET: ${JWT_REFRESH_SECRET:?JWT_REFRESH_SECRET is required}
      JWT_EXPIRES_IN: ${JWT_EXPIRES_IN:-15m}
      JWT_REFRESH_EXPIRES_IN: ${JWT_REFRESH_EXPIRES_IN:-7d}
      OLLAMA_BASE_URL: http://ollama:11434
      OLLAMA_MODEL: ${OLLAMA_MODEL:-llama3.2}
      CORS_ORIGIN: ${CORS_ORIGIN:-http://localhost:3000}
      UPLOAD_DIR: /app/uploads
      MAX_FILE_SIZE: ${MAX_FILE_SIZE:-10485760}
      RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW_MS: ${RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW_MS:-900000}
      RATE_LIMIT_MAX_REQUESTS: ${RATE_LIMIT_MAX_REQUESTS:-100}
    ports:
      - "${BACKEND_PORT:-3001}:3001"
    volumes:
      - backend_uploads:/app/uploads
      - backend_logs:/app/logs
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
      redis:
        condition: service_healthy
      ollama:
        condition: service_started
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "curl -f http://localhost:3001/health || exit 1"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s
    networks:
      - dateapp-network

  # Next.js Frontend
  frontend:
    build:
      context: ../frontend
      dockerfile: ../docker/Dockerfile.frontend
      args:
        NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
        NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL: ${NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL:-http://localhost:3001}
        NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL: ${NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL:-ws://localhost:3001}
        NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME: ${NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME:-DateApp}
    container_name: dateapp-frontend
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
      NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL: ${NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL:-http://localhost:3001}
      NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL: ${NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL:-ws://localhost:3001}
      NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME: ${NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME:-DateApp}
    ports:
      - "${FRONTEND_PORT:-3000}:3000"
    depends_on:
      backend:
        condition: service_healthy
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "curl -f http://localhost:3000 || exit 1"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 60s
    networks:
      - dateapp-network

  # Nginx Reverse Proxy
  nginx:
    image: nginx:alpine
    container_name: dateapp-nginx
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "${NGINX_HTTP_PORT:-80}:80"
      - "${NGINX_HTTPS_PORT:-443}:443"
    volumes:
      - ./nginx/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro
      - ./nginx/conf.d:/etc/nginx/conf.d:ro
      - ./nginx/ssl:/etc/nginx/ssl:ro
      - nginx_logs:/var/log/nginx
      - ./nginx/html:/usr/share/nginx/html:ro
    depends_on:
      frontend:
        condition: service_healthy
      backend:
        condition: service_healthy
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "nginx", "-t"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 10s
    networks:
      - dateapp-network

networks:
  dateapp-network:
    driver: bridge
    ipam:
      config:
        - subnet: 172.28.0.0/16

volumes:
  postgres_data:
    driver: local
  redis_data:
    driver: local
  ollama_data:
    driver: local
  backend_uploads:
    driver: local
  backend_logs:
    driver: local
  nginx_logs:
    driver: local
"}
[Tool: Write] {"file_path":"C:/Users/joshl/date-app/docker/Dockerfile.backend","content":"# Backend Dockerfile for Node.js API
# Multi-stage build for production optimization

# ============================================
# Stage 1: Dependencies
# ============================================
FROM node:20-alpine AS deps

# Install build dependencies for native modules
RUN apk add --no-cache libc6-compat python3 make g++

WORKDIR /app

# Copy package files
COPY package*.json ./
COPY yarn.lock* ./
COPY pnpm-lock.yaml* ./

# Install dependencies based on lockfile
RUN \
  if [ -f yarn.lock ]; then yarn install --frozen-lockfile --production=false; \
  elif [ -f pnpm-lock.yaml ]; then corepack enable pnpm && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile; \
  elif [ -f package-lock.json ]; then npm ci; \
  else npm install; \
  fi

# ============================================
# Stage 2: Builder
# ============================================
FROM node:20-alpine AS builder

WORKDIR /app

# Copy dependencies from deps stage
COPY --from=deps /app/node_modules ./node_modules
COPY . .

# Generate Prisma client if prisma schema exists
RUN if [ -f prisma/schema.prisma ]; then npx prisma generate; fi

# Build TypeScript if tsconfig exists
RUN \
  if [ -f tsconfig.json ]; then npm run build; \
  fi

# Prune dev dependencies
RUN \
  if [ -f yarn.lock ]; then yarn install --frozen-lockfile --production; \
  elif [ -f pnpm-lock.yaml ]; then corepack enable pnpm && pnpm prune --prod; \
  elif [ -f package-lock.json ]; then npm ci --only=production; \
  else npm prune --production; \
  fi

# ============================================
# Stage 3: Production Runner
# ============================================
FROM node:20-alpine AS runner

# Set environment
ARG NODE_ENV=production
ENV NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV}

# Install runtime dependencies
RUN apk add --no-cache \
  curl \
  dumb-init \
  && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*

# Create non-root user for security
RUN addgroup --system --gid 1001 nodejs \
  && adduser --system --uid 1001 nodeuser

WORKDIR /app

# Copy built application
COPY --from=builder --chown=nodeuser:nodejs /app/node_modules ./node_modules
COPY --from=builder --chown=nodeuser:nodejs /app/dist ./dist
COPY --from=builder --chown=nodeuser:nodejs /app/package.json ./package.json

# Copy Prisma files if they exist
COPY --from=builder --chown=nodeuser:nodejs /app/prisma ./prisma

# Create necessary directories
RUN mkdir -p /app/uploads /app/logs \
  && chown -R nodeuser:nodejs /app/uploads /app/logs

# Set user
USER nodeuser

# Expose port
EXPOSE 3001

# Health check
HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=10s --start-period=40s --retries=3 \
  CMD curl -f http://localhost:3001/health || exit 1

# Use dumb-init to handle signals properly
ENTRYPOINT ["dumb-init", "--"]

# Start the application
CMD ["node", "dist/index.js"]
"}
[Tool: Write] {"file_path":"C:/Users/joshl/date-app/docker/Dockerfile.frontend","content":"# Frontend Dockerfile for Next.js Application
# Multi-stage build for production optimization

# ============================================
# Stage 1: Dependencies
# ============================================
FROM node:20-alpine AS deps

# Install libc6-compat for Alpine compatibility
RUN apk add --no-cache libc6-compat

WORKDIR /app

# Copy package files
COPY package*.json ./
COPY yarn.lock* ./
COPY pnpm-lock.yaml* ./

# Install dependencies based on lockfile
RUN \
  if [ -f yarn.lock ]; then yarn install --frozen-lockfile; \
  elif [ -f pnpm-lock.yaml ]; then corepack enable pnpm && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile; \
  elif [ -f package-lock.json ]; then npm ci; \
  else npm install; \
  fi

# ============================================
# Stage 2: Builder
# ============================================
FROM node:20-alpine AS builder

WORKDIR /app

# Copy dependencies
COPY --from=deps /app/node_modules ./node_modules
COPY . .

# Set build-time environment variables
ARG NODE_ENV=production
ARG NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL
ARG NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL
ARG NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME

ENV NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV}
ENV NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=${NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL}
ENV NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL=${NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL}
ENV NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME=${NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME}
ENV NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1

# Build the application
RUN npm run build

# ============================================
# Stage 3: Production Runner
# ============================================
FROM node:20-alpine AS runner

WORKDIR /app

# Set environment
ARG NODE_ENV=production
ENV NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV}
ENV NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1

# Install runtime dependencies
RUN apk add --no-cache \
  curl \
  dumb-init \
  && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*

# Create non-root user for security
RUN addgroup --system --gid 1001 nodejs \
  && adduser --system --uid 1001 nextjs

# Copy public assets
COPY --from=builder /app/public ./public

# Set correct permissions for prerender cache
RUN mkdir .next \
  && chown nextjs:nodejs .next

# Copy standalone build (if using output: 'standalone')
# Uncomment these lines if using standalone mode in next.config.js
# COPY --from=builder --chown=nextjs:nodejs /app/.next/standalone ./
# COPY --from=builder --chown=nextjs:nodejs /app/.next/static ./.next/static

# Copy full .next build (standard mode)
COPY --from=builder --chown=nextjs:nodejs /app/.next ./.next
COPY --from=builder --chown=nextjs:nodejs /app/node_modules ./node_modules
COPY --from=builder --chown=nextjs:nodejs /app/package.json ./package.json

# Set runtime environment variables
ARG NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL
ARG NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL
ARG NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME

ENV NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=${NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL}
ENV NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL=${NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL}
ENV NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME=${NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME}

# Switch to non-root user
USER nextjs

# Expose port
EXPOSE 3000

# Set hostname for container
ENV HOSTNAME="0.0.0.0"
ENV PORT=3000

# Health check
HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=10s --start-period=60s --retries=3 \
  CMD curl -f http://localhost:3000 || exit 1

# Use dumb-init to handle signals properly
ENTRYPOINT ["dumb-init", "--"]

# Start Next.js
CMD ["npm", "start"]
"}

# AWS_S3_REGION=us-east-1

# -----------------------------------------
# Monitoring & Logging (Optional)

# SENTRY_DSN=your_sentry_dsn
# LOG_LEVEL=info

# -----------------------------------------
# Development Only
# -----------------------------------------
# Uncomment for development
# NODE_ENV=development
# DEBUG=*
"}

[Tool: Write] {"file_path":"C:/Users/joshl/date-app/docker/nginx/nginx.conf","content":"# Nginx Main Configuration for DateApp
# Production-ready configuration with security headers and optimizations

user nginx;
worker_processes auto;
error_log /var/log/nginx/error.log warn;
pid /var/run/nginx.pid;

# Maximum number of open files per worker process
worker_rlimit_nofile 65535;

events {
    worker_connections 4096;
    use epoll;
    multi_accept on;
}

http {
    # Basic Settings
    include /etc/nginx/mime.types;
    default_type application/octet-stream;

    # Logging Format
    log_format main '$remote_addr - $remote_user [$time_local] "$request" '
                    '$status $body_bytes_sent "$http_referer" '
                    '"$http_user_agent" "$http_x_forwarded_for" '
                    'rt=$request_time uct="$upstream_connect_time" '
                    'uht="$upstream_header_time" urt="$upstream_response_time"';

    log_format json_combined escape=json '{'
        '"time_local":"$time_local",'
        '"remote_addr":"$remote_addr",'
        '"remote_user":"$remote_user",'
        '"request":"$request",'
        '"status": "$status",'
        '"body_bytes_sent":"$body_bytes_sent",'
        '"request_time":"$request_time",'
        '"http_referrer":"$http_referer",'
        '"http_user_agent":"$http_user_agent",'
        '"http_x_forwarded_for":"$http_x_forwarded_for"'
    '}';

    access_log /var/log/nginx/access.log main;

    # Performance Optimizations
    sendfile on;
    tcp_nopush on;
    tcp_nodelay on;
    keepalive_timeout 65;
    types_hash_max_size 2048;
    server_tokens off;

    # Buffer Sizes
    client_body_buffer_size 16k;
    client_header_buffer_size 1k;
    client_max_body_size 50M;
    large_client_header_buffers 4 8k;

    # Timeouts
    client_body_timeout 60;
    client_header_timeout 60;
    send_timeout 60;

    # Gzip Compression
    gzip on;
    gzip_vary on;
    gzip_proxied any;
    gzip_comp_level 6;
    gzip_buffers 16 8k;
    gzip_http_version 1.1;
    gzip_min_length 256;
    gzip_types
        application/atom+xml
        application/geo+json
        application/javascript
        application/x-javascript
        application/json
        application/ld+json
        application/manifest+json
        application/rdf+xml
        application/rss+xml
        application/xhtml+xml
        application/xml
        font/eot
        font/otf
        font/ttf
        image/svg+xml
        text/css
        text/javascript
        text/plain
        text/xml;

    # Rate Limiting Zones
    limit_req_zone $binary_remote_addr zone=general:10m rate=10r/s;
    limit_req_zone $binary_remote_addr zone=api:10m rate=30r/s;
    limit_req_zone $binary_remote_addr zone=auth:10m rate=5r/s;
    limit_conn_zone $binary_remote_addr zone=conn_limit:10m;

    # Upstream Definitions
    upstream frontend {
        server frontend:3000;
        keepalive 32;
    }

    upstream backend {
        server backend:3001;
        keepalive 32;
    }

    # Security Headers Map
    map $sent_http_content_type $content_type_options {
        default "nosniff";
    }

    map $sent_http_content_type $frame_options {
        default "DENY";
    }

    # Include server configurations
    include /etc/nginx/conf.d/*.conf;
}
"}

# HTTP Server - Redirect to HTTPS in production
server {
    listen 80;
    listen [::]:80;
    server_name localhost _;

    # Health check endpoint for load balancers
    location /nginx-health {
        access_log off;
        return 200 "healthy\n";
        add_header Content-Type text/plain;
    }

    # In production, uncomment to redirect all HTTP to HTTPS
    # return 301 https://$server_name$request_uri;

    # For development/testing, include the main location blocks
    include /etc/nginx/conf.d/locations.conf;
}

[Tool: Write] {"file_path":"C:/Users/joshl/date-app/docker/nginx/conf.d/locations.conf","content":"# Location blocks for DateApp
# Included by both HTTP and HTTPS server blocks

# Security Headers
add_header X-Content-Type-Options "nosniff" always;
add_header X-Frame-Options "SAMEORIGIN" always;
add_header X-XSS-Protection "1; mode=block" always;
add_header Referrer-Policy "strict-origin-when-cross-origin" always;
add_header Permissions-Policy "camera=(), microphone=(), geolocation=(self), payment=()" always;

# Content Security Policy (adjust as needed)
# add_header Content-Security-Policy "default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: blob:; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' ws: wss:; frame-ancestors 'none';" always;

# Root location - Forward to frontend
location / {
    limit_req zone=general burst=20 nodelay;
    limit_conn conn_limit 20;

    proxy_pass http://frontend;
    proxy_http_version 1.1;
    proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade;
    proxy_set_header Connection 'upgrade';
    proxy_set_header Host $host;
    proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
    proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
    proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
    proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Host $host;
    proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Port $server_port;
    proxy_cache_bypass $http_upgrade;
    proxy_read_timeout 86400;

    # Enable WebSocket support for hot reload in development
    proxy_connect_timeout 7d;
    proxy_send_timeout 7d;
}

# API routes - Forward to backend
location /api {
    limit_req zone=api burst=50 nodelay;
    limit_conn conn_limit 30;

    # Remove /api prefix when forwarding
    rewrite ^/api/(.*)$ /$1 break;

    proxy_pass http://backend;
    proxy_http_version 1.1;
    proxy_set_header Host $host;
    proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
    proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
    proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
    proxy_set_header X-Request-ID $request_id;
    proxy_connect_timeout 60s;
    proxy_send_timeout 60s;
    proxy_read_timeout 60s;

    # Don't buffer for streaming responses
    proxy_buffering off;
}

# Auth routes - Stricter rate limiting
location /api/auth {
    limit_req zone=auth burst=10 nodelay;
    limit_conn conn_limit 10;

    rewrite ^/api/(.*)$ /$1 break;

    proxy_pass http://backend;
    proxy_http_version 1.1;
    proxy_set_header Host $host;
    proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
    proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
    proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
    proxy_set_header X-Request-ID $request_id;
}

# WebSocket endpoint for real-time features
location /ws {
    proxy_pass http://backend;
    proxy_http_version 1.1;
    proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade;
    proxy_set_header Connection "upgrade";
    proxy_set_header Host $host;
    proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
    proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
    proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
    proxy_read_timeout 86400;
    proxy_send_timeout 86400;
    proxy_connect_timeout 7d;
}

# Socket.IO endpoint
location /socket.io {
    proxy_pass http://backend;
    proxy_http_version 1.1;
    proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade;
    proxy_set_header Connection "upgrade";
    proxy_set_header Host $host;
    proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
    proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
    proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
    proxy_read_timeout 86400;
    proxy_send_timeout 86400;
}

# Health check endpoint
location /health {
    proxy_pass http://backend/health;
    proxy_http_version 1.1;
    proxy_set_header Host $host;
    access_log off;
}

# Backend health (for internal monitoring)
location /api/health {
    proxy_pass http://backend/health;
    proxy_http_version 1.1;
    proxy_set_header Host $host;
    access_log off;
}

# Static files with caching
location ~* \.(jpg|jpeg|png|gif|ico|svg|webp|woff|woff2|ttf|eot|otf)$ {
    proxy_pass http://frontend;
    proxy_http_version 1.1;
    proxy_set_header Host $host;
    expires 30d;
    add_header Cache-Control "public, immutable";
    access_log off;
}

# Next.js static assets
location /_next/static {
    proxy_pass http://frontend;
    proxy_http_version 1.1;
    proxy_set_header Host $host;
    expires 365d;
    add_header Cache-Control "public, immutable";
    access_log off;
}

# Uploaded files (if served directly)
location /uploads {
    alias /app/uploads;
    expires 30d;
    add_header Cache-Control "public";

    # Security: prevent script execution
    location ~* \.(php|pl|py|jsp|asp|sh|cgi)$ {
        deny all;
    }
}

# Favicon
location = /favicon.ico {
    proxy_pass http://frontend;
    log_not_found off;
    access_log off;
}

# Robots.txt
location = /robots.txt {
    proxy_pass http://frontend;
    log_not_found off;
    access_log off;
}

# Block access to sensitive files
location ~ /\. {
    deny all;
    access_log off;
    log_not_found off;
}

location ~ ^/(\.env|\.git|\.htaccess|\.htpasswd|composer\.(json|lock)|package(-lock)?\.json|yarn\.lock) {
    deny all;
    access_log off;
    log_not_found off;
}

# Error pages
error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html;
location = /50x.html {
    root /usr/share/nginx/html;
    internal;
}

error_page 404 /404.html;
location = /404.html {
    root /usr/share/nginx/html;
    internal;
}
"}

    <title>Service Temporarily Unavailable - DateApp</title>
    <style>
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        body {
            font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
            min-height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: 20px;
        }
        .container {
            background: white;
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 60px 40px;
            text-align: center;
            max-width: 500px;
            box-shadow: 0 25px 50px -12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);

            font-size: 16px;
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin-bottom: 30px;

            padding: 14px 32px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
            color: white;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 30px;
            font-weight: 600;
            transition: transform 0.2s, box-shadow 0.2s;
        }
        .btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.4);
        }
        .status {
            margin-top: 30px;
            padding: 15px;
            background: #f8f9fa;
            border-radius: 10px;
            font-size: 14px;
            color: #888;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="container">
        <div class="icon">😬</div>
        <h1>We'll Be Right Back</h1>
        <p>Our servers are taking a quick break. We're working hard to get everything back up and running.</p>
        <a href="/" class="btn">Try Again</a>
        <div class="status">
            If this persists, please try again in a few minutes.
        </div>
    </div>
</body>
</html>
"}

[Tool: Write] {"file_path":"C:/Users/joshl/date-app/docker/init-scripts/01-init.sql","content":"-- DateApp Database Initialization Script
-- This script runs when the PostgreSQL container is first created

-- Enable required extensions
CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS "uuid-ossp";
CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS "pgcrypto";
CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS "pg_trgm";

-- Create custom types
DO $$ BEGIN
    CREATE TYPE gender AS ENUM ('male', 'female', 'non_binary', 'other', 'prefer_not_to_say');
EXCEPTION
    WHEN duplicate_object THEN null;
END $$;

DO $$ BEGIN
    CREATE TYPE relationship_goal AS ENUM ('casual', 'dating', 'relationship', 'marriage', 'friendship');
EXCEPTION
    WHEN duplicate_object THEN null;
END $$;

DO $$ BEGIN
    CREATE TYPE match_status AS ENUM ('pending', 'matched', 'rejected', 'expired');
EXCEPTION
    WHEN duplicate_object THEN null;
END $$;

DO $$ BEGIN
    CREATE TYPE message_status AS ENUM ('sent', 'delivered', 'read');
EXCEPTION
    WHEN duplicate_object THEN null;
END $$;

-- Grant permissions (the main user is created by POSTGRES_USER env var)
-- Additional grants can be added here for read-only users, etc.

-- Create indexes function for better query performance
-- These will be properly created by Prisma migrations, but we set up the basics

-- Log initialization complete
DO $$
BEGIN
    RAISE NOTICE 'DateApp database initialization complete!';
END $$;
"}

[Tool: Write] {"file_path":"C:/Users/joshl/date-app/docker/docker-compose.override.yml","content":"# Docker Compose Override for Development
# This file automatically extends docker-compose.yml when both are present
# Use: docker-compose up (will use both files)
# For production only: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up

version: '3.8'

services:
  # Development PostgreSQL with debug logging
  postgres:
    environment:
      POSTGRES_HOST_AUTH_METHOD: trust
    command:
      - "postgres"
      - "-c"
      - "log_statement=all"
      - "-c"
      - "log_destination=stderr"

  # Redis without password for development
  redis:
    command: redis-server --appendonly yes
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "redis-cli", "ping"]

  # Ollama without GPU requirement for development
  ollama:
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          devices: []

  # Backend with hot reload
  backend:
    build:
      args:
        NODE_ENV: development
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: development
      DEBUG: "*"
    volumes:
      - ../backend/src:/app/src:ro
      - ../backend/package.json:/app/package.json:ro
    command: npm run dev

  # Frontend with hot reload
  frontend:
    build:
      args:
        NODE_ENV: development
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: development
      WATCHPACK_POLLING: "true"
    volumes:
      - ../frontend/src:/app/src:ro
      - ../frontend/public:/app/public:ro
      - ../frontend/package.json:/app/package.json:ro
    command: npm run dev

  # Nginx for development (no SSL)
  nginx:
    volumes:
      - ./nginx/dev.conf:/etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf:ro

  # Additional development tools
  adminer:
    image: adminer:latest
    container_name: dateapp-adminer
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "8080:8080"
    environment:
      ADMINER_DEFAULT_SERVER: postgres
      ADMINER_DESIGN: dracula
    depends_on:
      - postgres
    networks:
      - dateapp-network

  # Redis Commander for Redis management
  redis-commander:
    image: rediscommander/redis-commander:latest
    container_name: dateapp-redis-commander
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "8081:8081"
    environment:
      REDIS_HOSTS: local:redis:6379
    depends_on:
      - redis
    networks:
      - dateapp-network

  # MailHog for email testing
  mailhog:
    image: mailhog/mailhog:latest
    container_name: dateapp-mailhog
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "1025:1025"  # SMTP
      - "8025:8025"  # Web UI
    networks:
      - dateapp-network
"}
[Tool: Write] {"file_path":"C:/Users/joshl/date-app/docker/nginx/dev.conf","content":"# Development Nginx Configuration
# Simplified configuration without SSL for local development

server {
    listen 80;
    listen [::]:80;
    server_name localhost _;

    # Larger body size for development
    client_max_body_size 100M;

    # Disable rate limiting in development
    # limit_req zone=general burst=100 nodelay;

    # Health check
    location /nginx-health {
        access_log off;
        return 200 "healthy\n";
        add_header Content-Type text/plain;
    }

    # Frontend with hot reload support
    location / {
        proxy_pass http://frontend:3000;
        proxy_http_version 1.1;
        proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade;
        proxy_set_header Connection 'upgrade';
        proxy_set_header Host $host;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
        proxy_cache_bypass $http_upgrade;

        # Long timeout for hot reload
        proxy_read_timeout 86400;
        proxy_connect_timeout 86400;
        proxy_send_timeout 86400;
    }

    # Next.js HMR WebSocket
    location /_next/webpack-hmr {
        proxy_pass http://frontend:3000/_next/webpack-hmr;
        proxy_http_version 1.1;
        proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade;
        proxy_set_header Connection "upgrade";
        proxy_set_header Host $host;
        proxy_read_timeout 86400;
    }

    # API routes
    location /api {
        rewrite ^/api/(.*)$ /$1 break;
        proxy_pass http://backend:3001;
        proxy_http_version 1.1;
        proxy_set_header Host $host;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
        proxy_read_timeout 300s;
    }

    # WebSocket
    location /ws {
        proxy_pass http://backend:3001;
        proxy_http_version 1.1;
        proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade;
        proxy_set_header Connection "upgrade";
        proxy_set_header Host $host;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
        proxy_read_timeout 86400;
    }

    # Socket.IO
    location /socket.io {
        proxy_pass http://backend:3001;
        proxy_http_version 1.1;
        proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade;
        proxy_set_header Connection "upgrade";
        proxy_set_header Host $host;
        proxy_read_timeout 86400;
    }

    # Health checks
    location /health {
        proxy_pass http://backend:3001/health;
        access_log off;
    }

    # Adminer (database management)
    location /adminer/ {
        proxy_pass http://adminer:8080/;
        proxy_set_header Host $host;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
    }

    # Redis Commander
    location /redis/ {
        proxy_pass http://redis-commander:8081/;
        proxy_set_header Host $host;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
    }

    # MailHog
    location /mail/ {
        proxy_pass http://mailhog:8025/;
        proxy_http_version 1.1;
        proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade;
        proxy_set_header Connection "upgrade";
        proxy_set_header Host $host;
    }
}
"}

file.content:
# Complete Dating Platform - White-Label Ready

A comprehensive, production-ready dating platform solution designed for entrepreneurs and businesses looking to launch their own dating service. This white-label solution includes everything you need to deploy, customize, and scale your dating application.

## Product Overview

**Price: $2,499** | **License: Commercial Use**

### What's Included

- **Frontend Application** - Responsive landing pages and user interface
- **Backend API** - Node.js/Express server with full authentication
- **Admin Dashboard** - React-based control panel for platform management
- **Database Schema** - Complete PostgreSQL schema with Prisma ORM
- **Docker Configuration** - Production-ready containerization
- **Payment Integration** - Square payment processing (MCC 7273 compliant)
- **Documentation** - Comprehensive setup and deployment guides

## Key Features

### User Features
- Profile creation with photo uploads
- Advanced matching algorithm
- Real-time messaging
- Super likes and profile boosts
- Location-based discovery
- Push notifications

### Admin Features
- User management dashboard
- Content moderation tools
- Revenue analytics
- Subscription management
- Report handling
- Platform configuration

### Technical Features
- RESTful API architecture
- WebSocket support for real-time features
- Redis caching for performance
- S3-compatible photo storage
- Email notifications
- Age verification integration
- GDPR/CCPA compliance tools

## Quick Start

### Prerequisites

- Node.js 18+
- Docker & Docker Compose
- PostgreSQL 15+
- Redis 7+

### Installation

1. **Clone the repository**
   ```bash
   git clone https://github.com/your-org/dating-platform.git
   cd dating-platform
   ```

2. **Configure environment**
   ```bash
   cp .env.example .env
   # Edit .env with your configuration
   ```

3. **Start with Docker**
   ```bash
   docker-compose up -d
   ```

4. **Run database migrations**
   ```bash
   cd backend
   npx prisma migrate deploy
   npx prisma db seed
   ```

5. **Access the application**
   - Frontend: http://localhost:8080
   - Admin: http://localhost:3001
   - API: http://localhost:3000

## Project Structure

```
dating-platform/
 frontend/           # Landing pages and static assets
 backend/            # Node.js API server
    routes/         # API route handlers
    services/       # Business logic
    middleware/     # Auth, validation, etc.
    prisma/         # Database schema
 admin/              # React admin dashboard
    src/
       components/ # UI components
       pages/      # Dashboard views
       services/   # API integration
 database/
    prisma/         # Schema definitions
    migrations/     # Database migrations
    seed.js         # Sample data
 docker-compose.yml  # Container orchestration
 docs/               # Documentation
```

## Documentation

- [DEPLOYMENT.md](./DEPLOYMENT.md) - Full deployment guide
- [DATABASE-SETUP.md](./DATABASE-SETUP.md) - Database configuration
- [PAYMENT-SETUP.md](./PAYMENT-SETUP.md) - Square integration guide
- [SECURITY.md](./SECURITY.md) - Security best practices
- [COMPLIANCE.md](./COMPLIANCE.md) - Regulatory compliance

## Customization

### Branding
1. Update logo and colors in `admin/src/index.css`
2. Modify frontend templates in `frontend/`
3. Configure email templates in `backend/templates/`

### Features
1. Adjust matching algorithm in `backend/services/matching.js`
2. Customize subscription tiers in admin dashboard
3. Add new profile fields via Prisma schema

## API Documentation

API endpoints are documented using OpenAPI specification. Access the interactive documentation at `/api/docs` when running the backend.

### Key Endpoints

| Endpoint | Method | Description |
|----------|--------|-------------|
| `/api/auth/register` | POST | User registration |
| `/api/auth/login` | POST | User authentication |
| `/api/profiles` | GET | Browse profiles |
| `/api/matches` | GET | View matches |
| `/api/messages` | POST | Send message |
| `/api/subscriptions` | POST | Subscribe to plan |

## Support

### Commercial License

This product includes:
- 1 year of email support
- Access to updates and bug fixes
- Deployment assistance (first install)

### Community

- Documentation: See included docs
- Issues: GitHub Issues
- Updates: Watch this repository

## Requirements

### Server Requirements
- 2+ CPU cores
- 4GB+ RAM
- 50GB+ SSD storage
- SSL certificate

### Recommended Services
- AWS/GCP/Azure for hosting
- CloudFlare for CDN
- Square for payments
- SendGrid/SES for email
- S3/R2 for photo storage

## Version History

### v1.0.0 (Current)
- Initial release
- Complete user management
- Matching and messaging
- Payment integration
- Admin dashboard
- Docker support

## License

Commercial License - See LICENSE file for terms.

Copyright (c) 2024. All rights reserved.

---

**Ready to launch your dating platform?**

For questions or custom development inquiries, please contact us through the repository.

1version: '3.8'
     2
     3services:
     4  # PostgreSQL Database
     5  postgres:
     6    image: postgres:15-alpine
     7    container_name: dating-platform-db
     8    restart: unless-stopped
     9    environment:
    10      POSTGRES_DB: ${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
    11      POSTGRES_USER: ${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}
    12      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}
    13    volumes:
    14      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    15      - ./database/init:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
    16    ports:
    17      - "${POSTGRES_PORT:-5432}:5432"
    18    healthcheck:
    19      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U ${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}"]
    20      interval: 10s
    21      timeout: 5s
    22      retries: 5
    23    networks:
    24      - dating-network
    25
    26  # Redis Cache
    27  redis:
    28    image: redis:7-alpine
    29    container_name: dating-platform-redis
    30    restart: unless-stopped
    31    command: redis-server --appendonly yes --requirepass ${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}
    32    volumes:
    33      - redis_data:/data
    34    ports:
    35      - "${REDIS_PORT:-6379}:6379"
    36    healthcheck:
    37      test: ["CMD", "redis-cli", "ping"]
    38      interval: 10s
    39      timeout: 5s
    40      retries: 5
    41    networks:
    42      - dating-network
    43
    44  # Backend API
    45  backend:
    46    build:
    47      context: ./backend
    48      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    49    container_name: dating-platform-api
    50    restart: unless-stopped
    51    environment:
    52      NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
    53      PORT: 3000
    54      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
    55      REDIS_URL: redis://:${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}@redis:6379
    56      JWT_SECRET: ${JWT_SECRET:-your_jwt_secret_here}
    57      SQUARE_ACCESS_TOKEN: ${SQUARE_ACCESS_TOKEN}
    58      SQUARE_APPLICATION_ID: ${SQUARE_APPLICATION_ID}
    59      SQUARE_LOCATION_ID: ${SQUARE_LOCATION_ID}
    60      SQUARE_ENVIRONMENT: ${SQUARE_ENVIRONMENT:-production}
    61      FRONTEND_URL: ${FRONTEND_URL:-http://localhost:8080}
    62      AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID: ${AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID}
    63      AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY: ${AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY}
    64      AWS_S3_BUCKET: ${AWS_S3_BUCKET}
    65      AWS_REGION: ${AWS_REGION:-us-east-1}
    66      SMTP_HOST: ${SMTP_HOST}
    67      SMTP_PORT: ${SMTP_PORT:-587}
    68      SMTP_USER: ${SMTP_USER}
    69      SMTP_PASS: ${SMTP_PASS}
    70      EMAIL_FROM: ${EMAIL_FROM:-noreply@yourdomain.com}
    71    ports:
    72      - "${API_PORT:-3000}:3000"
    73    depends_on:
    74      postgres:
    75        condition: service_healthy
    76      redis:
    77        condition: service_healthy
    78    healthcheck:
    79      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3000/health"]
    80      interval: 30s
    81      timeout: 10s
    82      retries: 3
    83      start_period: 40s
    84    networks:
    85      - dating-network
    86
    87  # Frontend (Static files served by nginx)
    88  frontend:
    89    image: nginx:alpine
    90    container_name: dating-platform-frontend
    91    restart: unless-stopped
    92    volumes:
    93      - ./frontend:/usr/share/nginx/html:ro
    94      - ./nginx/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro
    95      - ./nginx/default.conf:/etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf:ro
    96    ports:
    97      - "${FRONTEND_PORT:-8080}:80"
    98    depends_on:
    99      - backend
   100    networks:
   101      - dating-network
   102
   103  # Admin Dashboard
   104  admin:
   105    build:
   106      context: ./admin
   107      dockerfile: Dockerfile.admin
   108    container_name: dating-platform-admin
   109    restart: unless-stopped
   110    environment:
   111      VITE_API_URL: ${ADMIN_API_URL:-http://localhost:3000/api}
   112    ports:
   113      - "${ADMIN_PORT:-3001}:80"
   114    depends_on:
   115      - backend
   116    networks:
   117      - dating-network
   118
   119  # Prisma Studio (Development only)
   120  prisma-studio:
   121    image: node:18-alpine
   122    container_name: dating-platform-prisma
   123    working_dir: /app
   124    command: npx prisma studio --port 5555 --browser none
   125    environment:
   126      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
   127    ports:
   128      - "${PRISMA_STUDIO_PORT:-5555}:5555"
   129    volumes:
   130      - ./database/prisma:/app/prisma
   131      - ./backend/node_modules:/app/node_modules
   132    depends_on:
   133      postgres:
   134        condition: service_healthy
   135    networks:
   136      - dating-network
   137    profiles:
   138      - development
   139
   140  # Ollama - Local LLM Server (optimized for GTX 1050Ti 4GB VRAM)
   141  ollama:
   142    image: ollama/ollama:latest
   143    container_name: dating-platform-ollama
   144    restart: unless-stopped
   145    volumes:
   146      - ollama_models:/root/.ollama
   147    ports:
   148      - "${OLLAMA_PORT:-11434}:11434"
   149    environment:
   150      # Memory optimization for 4GB VRAM GTX 1050Ti
   151      OLLAMA_NUM_GPU: 1
   152      OLLAMA_GPU_MEMORY: 3584  # ~3.5GB to leave headroom
   153      OLLAMA_NUM_PARALLEL: 1   # Single request at a time for limited VRAM
   154      OLLAMA_MAX_LOADED_MODELS: 1  # Only one model in VRAM at a time
   155    deploy:
   156      resources:
   157        reservations:
   158          devices:
   159            - driver: nvidia
   160              count: 1
   161              capabilities: [gpu]
   162        limits:
   163          memory: 6G  # System RAM limit
   164    healthcheck:
   165      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:11434/api/tags"]
   166      interval: 30s
   167      timeout: 10s
   168      retries: 3
   169      start_period: 60s
   170    networks:
   171      - dating-network
   172
   173  # MinIO - S3-Compatible Object Storage
   174  minio:
   175    image: minio/minio:latest
   176    container_name: dating-platform-minio
   177    restart: unless-stopped
   178    command: server /data --console-address ":9001"
   179    environment:
   180      MINIO_ROOT_USER: ${MINIO_ROOT_USER:-minioadmin}
   181      MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD: ${MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD:-minioadmin123}
   182    volumes:
   183      - minio_data:/data
   184    ports:
   185      - "${MINIO_API_PORT:-9000}:9000"
   186      - "${MINIO_CONSOLE_PORT:-9001}:9001"
   187    healthcheck:
   188      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:9000/minio/health/live"]
   189      interval: 30s
   190      timeout: 10s
   191      retries: 3
   192    networks:
   193      - dating-network
   194
   195  # MailHog - Email Testing Server
   196  mailhog:
   197    image: mailhog/mailhog:latest
   198    container_name: dating-platform-mailhog
   199    restart: unless-stopped
   200    ports:
   201      - "${MAILHOG_SMTP_PORT:-1025}:1025"
   202      - "${MAILHOG_WEB_PORT:-8025}:8025"
   203    networks:
   204      - dating-network
   205
   206  # AI Services
   207  ai-services:
   208    build:
   209      context: ./ai-services
   210      dockerfile: Dockerfile
   211    container_name: dating-platform-ai
   212    restart: unless-stopped
   213    environment:
   214      NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
   215      PORT: 3002
   216      OLLAMA_BASE_URL: http://ollama:11434
   217      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
   218      REDIS_URL: redis://:${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}@redis:6379
   219      MINIO_ENDPOINT: minio
   220      MINIO_PORT: 9000
   221      MINIO_ACCESS_KEY: ${MINIO_ROOT_USER:-minioadmin}
   222      MINIO_SECRET_KEY: ${MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD:-minioadmin123}
   223    ports:
   224      - "${AI_SERVICES_PORT:-3002}:3002"
   225    depends_on:
   226      postgres:
   227        condition: service_healthy
   228      redis:
   229        condition: service_healthy
   230      ollama:
   231        condition: service_healthy
   232      minio:
   233        condition: service_healthy
   234    healthcheck:
   235      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3002/health"]
   236      interval: 30s
   237      timeout: 10s
   238      retries: 3
   239      start_period: 40s
   240    networks:
   241      - dating-network
   242
   243volumes:
   244  postgres_data:
   245    driver: local
   246  redis_data:
   247    driver: local
   248  ollama_models:
   249    driver: local

version: '3.8'

services:
  # PostgreSQL Database
  postgres:
    image: postgres:15-alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-db
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      POSTGRES_DB: ${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
      POSTGRES_USER: ${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
      - ./database/init:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
    ports:
      - "${POSTGRES_PORT:-5432}:5432"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U ${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Redis Cache
  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-redis
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: redis-server --appendonly yes --requirepass ${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}
    volumes:
      - redis_data:/data
    ports:
      - "${REDIS_PORT:-6379}:6379"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "redis-cli", "ping"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Backend API
  backend:
    build:
      context: ./backend
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    container_name: dating-platform-api
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
      PORT: 3000
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
      REDIS_URL: redis://:${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}@redis:6379
      JWT_SECRET: ${JWT_SECRET:-your_jwt_secret_here}
      SQUARE_ACCESS_TOKEN: ${SQUARE_ACCESS_TOKEN}
      SQUARE_APPLICATION_ID: ${SQUARE_APPLICATION_ID}
      SQUARE_LOCATION_ID: ${SQUARE_LOCATION_ID}
      SQUARE_ENVIRONMENT: ${SQUARE_ENVIRONMENT:-production}
      FRONTEND_URL: ${FRONTEND_URL:-http://localhost:8080}
      AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID: ${AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID}
      AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY: ${AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY}
      AWS_S3_BUCKET: ${AWS_S3_BUCKET}
      AWS_REGION: ${AWS_REGION:-us-east-1}
      SMTP_HOST: ${SMTP_HOST}
      SMTP_PORT: ${SMTP_PORT:-587}
      SMTP_USER: ${SMTP_USER}
      SMTP_PASS: ${SMTP_PASS}
      EMAIL_FROM: ${EMAIL_FROM:-noreply@yourdomain.com}
    ports:
      - "${API_PORT:-3000}:3000"
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
      redis:
        condition: service_healthy
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3000/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Frontend (Static files served by nginx)
  frontend:
    image: nginx:alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-frontend
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - ./frontend:/usr/share/nginx/html:ro
      - ./nginx/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro
      - ./nginx/default.conf:/etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf:ro
    ports:
      - "${FRONTEND_PORT:-8080}:80"
    depends_on:
      - backend
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Admin Dashboard
  admin:
    build:
      context: ./admin
      dockerfile: Dockerfile.admin
    container_name: dating-platform-admin
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      VITE_API_URL: ${ADMIN_API_URL:-http://localhost:3000/api}
    ports:
      - "${ADMIN_PORT:-3001}:80"
    depends_on:
      - backend
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # Prisma Studio (Development only)
  prisma-studio:
    image: node:18-alpine
    container_name: dating-platform-prisma
    working_dir: /app
    command: npx prisma studio --port 5555 --browser none
    environment:
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
    ports:
      - "${PRISMA_STUDIO_PORT:-5555}:5555"
    volumes:
      - ./database/prisma:/app/prisma
      - ./backend/node_modules:/app/node_modules
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
    networks:
      - dating-network
    profiles:
      - development

  # Ollama - Local LLM Server (optimized for GTX 1050Ti 4GB VRAM)
  ollama:
    image: ollama/ollama:latest
    container_name: dating-platform-ollama
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - ollama_models:/root/.ollama
    ports:
      - "${OLLAMA_PORT:-11434}:11434"
    environment:
      # Memory optimization for 4GB VRAM GTX 1050Ti
      OLLAMA_NUM_GPU: 1
      OLLAMA_GPU_MEMORY: 3584  # ~3.5GB to leave headroom
      OLLAMA_NUM_PARALLEL: 1   # Single request at a time for limited VRAM
      OLLAMA_MAX_LOADED_MODELS: 1  # Only one model in VRAM at a time
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          devices:
            - driver: nvidia
              count: 1
              capabilities: [gpu]
        limits:
          memory: 6G  # System RAM limit
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:11434/api/tags"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 60s
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # MinIO - S3-Compatible Object Storage
  minio:
    image: minio/minio:latest
    container_name: dating-platform-minio
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: server /data --console-address ":9001"
    environment:
      MINIO_ROOT_USER: ${MINIO_ROOT_USER:-minioadmin}
      MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD: ${MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD:-minioadmin123}
    volumes:
      - minio_data:/data
    ports:
      - "${MINIO_API_PORT:-9000}:9000"
      - "${MINIO_CONSOLE_PORT:-9001}:9001"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:9000/minio/health/live"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # MailHog - Email Testing Server
  mailhog:
    image: mailhog/mailhog:latest
    container_name: dating-platform-mailhog
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "${MAILHOG_SMTP_PORT:-1025}:1025"
      - "${MAILHOG_WEB_PORT:-8025}:8025"
    networks:
      - dating-network

  # AI Services
  ai-services:
    build:
      context: ./ai-services
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    container_name: dating-platform-ai
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
      PORT: 3002
      OLLAMA_BASE_URL: http://ollama:11434
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-postgres}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:-your_secure_password}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dating_platform}
      REDIS_URL: redis://:${REDIS_PASSWORD:-your_redis_password}@redis:6379
      MINIO_ENDPOINT: minio
      MINIO_PORT: 9000
      MINIO_ACCESS_KEY: ${MINIO_ROOT_USER:-minioadmin}
      MINIO_SECRET_KEY: ${MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD:-minioadmin123}
    ports:
      - "${AI_SERVICES_PORT:-3002}:3002"
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
      redis:
        condition: service_healthy
      ollama:
        condition: service_healthy
      minio:
        condition: service_healthy
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:3002/health"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s
    networks:
      - dating-network

volumes:
  postgres_data:
    driver: local
  redis_data:
    driver: local
  ollama_models:
    driver: local
  minio_data:
    driver: local

networks:
  dating-network:
    driver: bridge

file.content:
# 
# DATING PLATFORM - ENVIRONMENT VARIABLES
# Copy this file to .env and fill in your values
# NEVER COMMIT .env TO GIT - IT CONTAINS SECRETS
# 

# 
# APPLICATION SETTINGS
# 
NODE_ENV=production
PORT=3000
APP_NAME=Dating Platform
APP_URL=https://your-domain.com

# 
# DATABASE (PostgreSQL)
# 
DATABASE_URL=postgresql://postgres:your_secure_password@localhost:5432/dating_platform
POSTGRES_USER=postgres
POSTGRES_PASSWORD=your_secure_password
POSTGRES_DB=dating_platform
POSTGRES_PORT=5432

# 
# REDIS CACHE
# 
REDIS_URL=redis://:your_redis_password@localhost:6379
REDIS_PASSWORD=your_redis_password
REDIS_PORT=6379

# 
# SECURITY & AUTHENTICATION
# Generate strong random strings (at least 32 characters)
# Use: openssl rand -hex 32
# 
JWT_SECRET=your_random_jwt_secret_at_least_32_characters
SESSION_SECRET=your_random_session_secret_at_least_32_characters
ENCRYPTION_KEY=your_encryption_key_for_sensitive_data

# 
# SQUARE PAYMENT PROCESSING
# Get credentials from: https://developer.squareup.com/apps
# MCC 7273 - Dating and Escort Services Category
# 
SQUARE_ACCESS_TOKEN=EAAAxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
SQUARE_APPLICATION_ID=sq0idp-xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
SQUARE_LOCATION_ID=XXXXXXXXXXXXXX
SQUARE_ENVIRONMENT=production
SQUARE_WEBHOOK_SECRET=your_webhook_signature_key
SQUARE_WEBHOOK_URL=https://your-domain.com/webhook/square

# Subscription Plan IDs (create these in Square Dashboard)
SQUARE_BASIC_PLAN_ID=your_basic_plan_id
SQUARE_PREMIUM_PLAN_ID=your_premium_plan_id
SQUARE_VIP_PLAN_ID=your_vip_plan_id

# 
# AWS S3 (Photo Storage)
# 
AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=your_aws_access_key
AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=your_aws_secret_key
AWS_S3_BUCKET=your-dating-platform-photos
AWS_REGION=us-east-1
AWS_CLOUDFRONT_URL=https://your-cloudfront-distribution.cloudfront.net

# 
# EMAIL CONFIGURATION (SMTP)
# 
SMTP_HOST=smtp.your-email-provider.com
SMTP_PORT=587
SMTP_USER=your_smtp_username
SMTP_PASS=your_smtp_password
EMAIL_FROM=noreply@your-domain.com
EMAIL_FROM_NAME=Dating Platform

# 
# PUSH NOTIFICATIONS (Firebase Cloud Messaging)
# 
FCM_SERVER_KEY=your_firebase_server_key
FCM_PROJECT_ID=your_firebase_project_id

# 
# CONTENT MODERATION (AI-powered)
# 
# Google Cloud Vision API
GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT_ID=your_project_id
GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=/path/to/service-account.json

# OpenAI (for text moderation)
OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-your_openai_api_key

# 
# AGE VERIFICATION SERVICE
# 
# Options: jumio, onfido, veriff
AGE_VERIFICATION_PROVIDER=onfido
ONFIDO_API_TOKEN=your_onfido_api_token
ONFIDO_WEBHOOK_SECRET=your_onfido_webhook_secret

# 
# GEOLOCATION SERVICE
# 
GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY=your_google_maps_api_key
MAXMIND_LICENSE_KEY=your_maxmind_license_key

# 
# FRONTEND CONFIGURATION
# 
FRONTEND_URL=https://your-domain.com
ADMIN_URL=https://admin.your-domain.com
CORS_ORIGINS=https://your-domain.com,https://admin.your-domain.com

# 
# MONITORING & LOGGING
# 
SENTRY_DSN=https://your_sentry_dsn@sentry.io/project_id
LOG_LEVEL=info

# 
# DOCKER CONFIGURATION
# 
API_PORT=3000
FRONTEND_PORT=8080
ADMIN_PORT=3001
PRISMA_STUDIO_PORT=5555

# 
# RATE LIMITING
# 
RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW_MS=900000
RATE_LIMIT_MAX_REQUESTS=100

# 
# COMPLIANCE SETTINGS (MCC 7273)
# 
REQUIRE_AGE_VERIFICATION=true
MIN_USER_AGE=18
CONTENT_MODERATION_ENABLED=true
FOSTA_SESTA_COMPLIANT=true
GDPR_COMPLIANT=true
CCPA_COMPLIANT=true

# 
# FOR THE KIDS - API ENVIRONMENT VARIABLES
# Copy this file to .env and fill in your values
#  NEVER COMMIT .env TO GIT - IT CONTAINS SECRETS
# 

# 
# LEGAL ENTITY INFORMATION
# 
LEGAL_NAME=YOUR_LLC_NAME
EIN=XX-XXXXXXX
FL_DOC_NUMBER=LXXXXXXXXXX
CHARITY_EIN=PENDING_VERIFICATION
OWNER_NAME=Your Name
OWNER_EMAIL=your@email.com

# 
# MISSION & REVENUE MODEL (IMMUTABLE - DO NOT CHANGE)
# Gospel V1.3 Split: 60% Charity, 30% Infrastructure, 10% Founder
# 
MISSION=FOR_THE_KIDS
CHARITY_PERCENTAGE=60
INFRASTRUCTURE_PERCENTAGE=30
FOUNDER_PERCENTAGE=10
CHARITY_NAME=Verified Pediatric Charities
CHARITY_TAX_ID=PENDING_VERIFICATION

# 
# DATABASE (PostgreSQL)
# 
DATABASE_URL=postgresql://user:password@localhost:5432/database_name
POSTGRES_USER=postgres
POSTGRES_PASSWORD=your_secure_password
POSTGRES_DB=for_the_kids

# 
# REDIS CACHE
# 
REDIS_URL=redis://localhost:6379

# 
# GITHUB (For deployments and CI/CD)
# Get token: https://github.com/settings/tokens
# 
GITHUB_TOKEN=ghp_xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
GITHUB_ORG=Your-Org-Name
GITHUB_REPO=Your-Repo-Name
GITHUB_BRANCH=main
GITHUB_USER=your-username

# 
# CLOUDFLARE (Hosting/DNS/CDN)
# Get from: https://dash.cloudflare.com/profile/api-tokens
# 
CLOUDFLARE_EMAIL=your@email.com
CLOUDFLARE_GLOBAL_API_KEY=your_cloudflare_global_api_key
CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID=your_cloudflare_account_id

# Zone IDs for each domain (find in Cloudflare dashboard)
CLOUDFLARE_ZONE_AIDOESITALL=your_zone_id
CLOUDFLARE_ZONE_YOUANDINOTAI=your_zone_id
CLOUDFLARE_ZONE_YOUANDINOTAI_ONLINE=your_zone_id
CLOUDFLARE_ZONE_AISOLUTIONS=your_zone_id
CLOUDFLARE_ZONE_ONLINERECYCLE=your_zone_id
CLOUDFLARE_ZONE_TRASHORTREASURE=your_zone_id

# 
# AI API KEYS
# 

# Google Gemini - https://aistudio.google.com/apikey
GEMINI_API_KEY=your_gemini_api_key

# OpenAI - https://platform.openai.com/api-keys
OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-your_openai_api_key

# xAI Grok - https://x.ai/api
XAI_API_KEY=xai-your_xai_api_key

# Perplexity - https://docs.perplexity.ai/
PERPLEXITY_API_KEY=pplx-your_perplexity_api_key

# Azure OpenAI - https://portal.azure.com
AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY=your_azure_openai_key
AZURE_OPENAI_ENDPOINT=https://your-resource.openai.azure.com/

# Stability AI - https://platform.stability.ai/account/keys
STABILITY_API_KEY=sk-your_stability_api_key

# Replicate - https://replicate.com/account/api-tokens
REPLICATE_API_TOKEN=r8_your_replicate_token

# Ollama (Local LLM - no key needed)
OLLAMA_API_BASE=http://localhost:11434

# 
# PRINTFUL (Merch Fulfillment)
# Get from: https://www.printful.com/dashboard/developer/api
# 
PRINTFUL_API_TOKEN=your_printful_api_token
PRINTFUL_STORE_ID=your_store_id
PRINTFUL_STORE_NAME=Your-Store-Name
PRINTFUL_WEBHOOK_URL=https://your-domain.com/webhook/printful

# 
# PAYMENT PROCESSORS (LIVE PRODUCTION)
# 

# SQUARE DATING (High-Risk Category Account)
# Get from: https://developer.squareup.com/apps
SQUARE_ACCESS_TOKEN=EAAAxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
SQUARE_APPLICATION_ID=sq0idp-xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
SQUARE_LOCATION_ID=XXXXXXXXXXXXXX
SQUARE_PREMIUM_PLAN_ID=your_premium_plan_id
SQUARE_VIP_PLAN_ID=your_vip_plan_id
SQUARE_WEBHOOK_SECRET=your_webhook_signature_key
SQUARE_WEBHOOK_URL=https://your-domain.com/webhook/square-dating
SQUARE_ENVIRONMENT=production

# SQUARE MERCH/AI (Standard Category Account)
SQUARE_MERCH_ACCESS_TOKEN=EAAAxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
SQUARE_MERCH_LOCATION_ID=XXXXXXXXXXXXXX
SQUARE_MERCH_WEBHOOK_SECRET=your_merch_webhook_key
SQUARE_MERCH_WEBHOOK_URL=https://your-domain.com/webhook/square-merch

# [STRIPE REMOVED - December 2025 - Migrated to Square]
# All payment processing now uses Square (Location ID: LTDX6ZANTVEEN)

# 
# SECURITY & AUTHENTICATION
# Generate strong random strings for these
# 
JWT_SECRET=your_random_jwt_secret_at_least_32_characters
SESSION_SECRET=your_random_session_secret_at_least_32_characters

# 
# CHILD SAFETY (IMMUTABLE - DO NOT CHANGE)
# Required for COPPA/FOSTA-SESTA compliance
# 
FORCE_BABY_MODE=true
ENABLE_BABY_GROK=true
COPPA_COMPLIANT_MODE=true
REQUIRE_AGE_VERIFICATION_FOR_ADULT_AI=true
FOSTA_SESTA_COMPLIANT=true
AGE_VERIFICATION_REQUIRED=true
MIN_AGE_FOR_ADULT_AI=18
DEFAULT_KIDS_MODEL=grok-3-kids
DEFAULT_ADULT_MODEL=grok-4

# 
# BRAND CONFIGURATION
# 
BRAND_MODE=benevolent_technocracy
THEME_MODE=dark_void
BACKGROUND_COLOR=#141413
PRIMARY_COLOR=#CC785C
SECONDARY_COLOR=#078EFA
ACCENT_COLOR=#20808D

# 
# FRONTEND URLS
# 
FRONTEND_URL=https://your-dashboard.pages.dev
LOCAL_FRONTEND_URL=http://localhost:5173
BACKEND_URL=http://localhost:8080
SUPPORT_EMAIL=support@your-domain.com

# 
# SERVER CONFIGURATION
# 
PORT=3000
NODE_ENV=development

# 
# PROJECT PATHS (adjust for your OS)
# 
PROJECT_ROOT=/path/to/AiCollabForTheKids
API_DIR=/path/to/AiCollabForTheKids/api
DASHBOARD_DIR=/path/to/AiCollabForTheKids/jules-dashboard
CLAUDE_DROID_DIR=/path/to/AiCollabForTheKids/claude-droid
DOCS_DIR=/path/to/AiCollabForTheKids/docs

# 
# DOMAIN PORTFOLIO
# 
DOMAIN_DATING_PRIMARY=your-dating-domain.com
DOMAIN_DATING_ALT=your-dating-alt.com
DOMAIN_AI_PRIMARY=your-ai-domain.com
DOMAIN_DASHBOARD=your-dashboard.pages.dev

# 
# CLOUDFLARE TUNNEL (Optional - for exposing local services)
# 
CLOUDFLARE_TUNNEL_URL=https://your-tunnel.trycloudflare.com
API_PUBLIC_URL=https://your-tunnel.trycloudflare.com

# 
# HARDWARE NODES (Optional - for multi-machine setup)
# 
T5500_IP=192.168.0.101
T5500_USER=your_user
T5500_API_PORT=3000
T5500_DASHBOARD_PORT=8080
SABERTOOTH_IP=192.168.0.104

# 
# GOOGLE CLOUD PROJECT (Optional - for analytics)
# 
GOOGLE_PROJECT_NAME=Your Project Name
GOOGLE_PROJECT_NUMBER=000000000000
GOOGLE_PROJECT_ID=your-project-id

# 
# NEWS API (For Claude Droid automation)
# Get free key from https://newsapi.org
# 
NEWS_API_KEY=your_news_api_key

# 
# YOUTUBE DATA API v3 (For Claude Droid video uploads)
# Setup guide: docs/YOUTUBE-SETUP.md
# Create OAuth credentials at https://console.cloud.google.com
# 
YOUTUBE_CLIENT_ID=your_client_id.apps.googleusercontent.com
YOUTUBE_CLIENT_SECRET=your_client_secret
YOUTUBE_REDIRECT_URI=http://localhost:3000/api/youtube/callback
YOUTUBE_REFRESH_TOKEN=your_refresh_token_after_oauth_flow

input.content:
{
  "name": "dating-platform-ai-services",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "AI-powered features for the dating platform using Ollama/Llama",
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "tsx watch src/index.ts",
    "build": "tsc",
    "start": "node dist/index.js",
    "test": "jest"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "express": "^4.18.2",
    "cors": "^2.8.5",
    "helmet": "^7.1.0",
    "compression": "^1.7.4",
    "morgan": "^1.10.0",
    "axios": "^1.6.2",
    "ioredis": "^5.3.2",
    "zod": "^3.22.4",
    "uuid": "^9.0.1",
    "dotenv": "^16.3.1"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/express": "^4.17.21",
    "@types/cors": "^2.8.17",
    "@types/compression": "^1.7.5",
    "@types/morgan": "^1.9.9",
    "@types/uuid": "^9.0.7",
    "@types/node": "^20.10.4",
    "typescript": "^5.3.3",
    "tsx": "^4.6.2",
    "jest": "^29.7.0",
    "@types/jest": "^29.5.11"
  }
}

{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "ES2022",
    "module": "CommonJS",
    "lib": ["ES2022"],
    "outDir": "./dist",
    "rootDir": "./src",
    "strict": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "declaration": true,
    "declarationMap": true,
    "sourceMap": true
  },
  "include": ["src/**/*"],
  "exclude": ["node_modules", "dist"]
}

# AI Services Dockerfile
# Optimized for Ollama/Llama integration

FROM node:20-alpine AS builder

WORKDIR /app

# Copy package files
COPY package*.json ./

# Install dependencies
RUN npm ci

# Copy source
COPY . .

# Build TypeScript
RUN npm run build

# Production stage
FROM node:20-alpine AS runner

WORKDIR /app

# Install curl for health checks
RUN apk add --no-cache curl

# Create non-root user
RUN addgroup --system --gid 1001 nodejs \
  && adduser --system --uid 1001 nodeuser

# Copy built application
COPY --from=builder /app/dist ./dist
COPY --from=builder /app/node_modules ./node_modules
COPY --from=builder /app/package.json ./

USER nodeuser

EXPOSE 3002

HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=10s --start-period=40s --retries=3 \
  CMD curl -f http://localhost:3002/health || exit 1

CMD ["node", "dist/index.js"]

toolUseResult.content:
# AI Services Dockerfile
# Optimized for Ollama/Llama integration

FROM node:20-alpine AS builder

WORKDIR /app

# Copy package files
COPY package*.json ./

# Install dependencies
RUN npm ci

# Copy source
COPY . .

# Build TypeScript
RUN npm run build

# Production stage
FROM node:20-alpine AS runner

WORKDIR /app

# Install curl for health checks
RUN apk add --no-cache curl

# Create non-root user
RUN addgroup --system --gid 1001 nodejs \
  && adduser --system --uid 1001 nodeuser

# Copy built application
COPY --from=builder /app/dist ./dist
COPY --from=builder /app/node_modules ./node_modules
COPY --from=builder /app/package.json ./

USER nodeuser

EXPOSE 3002

HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=10s --start-period=40s --retries=3 \
  CMD curl -f http://localhost:3002/health || exit 1

CMD ["node", "dist/index.js"]

# 
# DATING PLATFORM - LOCAL DEVELOPMENT CONFIGURATION
# 9020 i7K 32GB RAM GTX 1050Ti Setup
# 

# 
# APPLICATION SETTINGS
# 
NODE_ENV=development
PORT=3000
APP_NAME=Spark Dating
APP_URL=http://localhost:8080

# 
# DATABASE (PostgreSQL)
# 
DATABASE_URL=postgresql://postgres:SparkDate2026!@localhost:5432/dating_platform
POSTGRES_USER=postgres
POSTGRES_PASSWORD=SparkDate2026!
POSTGRES_DB=dating_platform
POSTGRES_PORT=5432

# 
# REDIS CACHE
# 
REDIS_URL=redis://:SparkRedis2026!@localhost:6379
REDIS_PASSWORD=SparkRedis2026!
REDIS_PORT=6379

# 
# SECURITY & AUTHENTICATION
# 
JWT_SECRET=spark_jwt_secret_2026_development_key_32chars
SESSION_SECRET=spark_session_secret_2026_dev_key_32chars
ENCRYPTION_KEY=spark_encryption_key_2026_dev_32chars

# 
# SQUARE PAYMENT PROCESSING (SANDBOX FOR DEV)
# 
SQUARE_ACCESS_TOKEN=SANDBOX_ACCESS_TOKEN
SQUARE_APPLICATION_ID=SANDBOX_APP_ID
SQUARE_LOCATION_ID=SANDBOX_LOCATION
SQUARE_ENVIRONMENT=sandbox
SQUARE_WEBHOOK_SECRET=sandbox_webhook

# 
# AWS S3 (LOCAL MINIO FOR DEV)
# 
AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=minioadmin
AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=minioadmin
AWS_S3_BUCKET=dating-photos
AWS_REGION=us-east-1
AWS_S3_ENDPOINT=http://localhost:9000

# 
# EMAIL (MAILHOG FOR DEV)
# 
SMTP_HOST=localhost
SMTP_PORT=1025
SMTP_USER=
SMTP_PASS=
EMAIL_FROM=noreply@spark.dating
EMAIL_FROM_NAME=Spark Dating

# 
# OLLAMA / LLAMA AI INTEGRATION (LOCAL GPU)
# Optimized for GTX 1050Ti 4GB VRAM
# 
OLLAMA_HOST=http://localhost:11434
OLLAMA_MODEL=llama3.2:3b
AI_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:8001
AI_ENABLED=true

# 
# FRONTEND CONFIGURATION
# 
FRONTEND_URL=http://localhost:8080
ADMIN_URL=http://localhost:3001
CORS_ORIGINS=http://localhost:8080,http://localhost:3001

# 
# DOCKER CONFIGURATION
# 
API_PORT=3000
FRONTEND_PORT=8080
ADMIN_PORT=3001
PRISMA_STUDIO_PORT=5555

# 
# RATE LIMITING
# 
RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW_MS=900000
RATE_LIMIT_MAX_REQUESTS=100

# 
# COMPLIANCE SETTINGS
# 
REQUIRE_AGE_VERIFICATION=false
MIN_USER_AGE=18
CONTENT_MODERATION_ENABLED=true
GDPR_COMPLIANT=true
CCPA_COMPLIANT=true

services:
  # PostgreSQL Database
  postgres:
    image: postgres:16-alpine
    container_name: dateapp-postgres
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      POSTGRES_USER: ${POSTGRES_USER:-dateapp}
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ${POSTGRES_PASSWORD:?POSTGRES_PASSWORD is required}
      POSTGRES_DB: ${POSTGRES_DB:-dateapp}
      PGDATA: /var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata
    ports:
      - "${POSTGRES_PORT:-5432}:5432"
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
      - ./init-scripts:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d:ro
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U ${POSTGRES_USER:-dateapp} -d ${POSTGRES_DB:-dateapp}"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5
      start_period: 30s
    networks:
      - dateapp-network

  # Redis Cache & Session Store
  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    container_name: dateapp-redis
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: redis-server --appendonly yes --requirepass ${REDIS_PASSWORD:?REDIS_PASSWORD is required}
    ports:
      - "${REDIS_PORT:-6379}:6379"
    volumes:
      - redis_data:/data
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "redis-cli", "-a", "${REDIS_PASSWORD}", "ping"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5
      start_period: 10s
    networks:
      - dateapp-network

  # Ollama - Llama AI Service
  ollama:
    image: ollama/ollama:latest
    container_name: dateapp-ollama
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "${OLLAMA_PORT:-11434}:11434"
    volumes:
      - ollama_data:/root/.ollama
    environment:
      - OLLAMA_HOST=0.0.0.0
      - OLLAMA_ORIGINS=*
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "curl -f http://localhost:11434/api/tags || exit 1"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 60s
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          devices:
            - driver: nvidia
              count: all
              capabilities: [gpu]
    networks:
      - dateapp-network

  # Node.js Backend API
  backend:
    build:
      context: ../backend
      dockerfile: ../docker/Dockerfile.backend
      args:
        NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
    container_name: dateapp-backend
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
      PORT: 3001
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER:-dateapp}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD}@postgres:5432/${POSTGRES_DB:-dateapp}?schema=public
      REDIS_URL: redis://:${REDIS_PASSWORD}@redis:6379
      REDIS_HOST: redis
      REDIS_PORT: 6379
      REDIS_PASSWORD: ${REDIS_PASSWORD}
      JWT_SECRET: ${JWT_SECRET:?JWT_SECRET is required}
      JWT_REFRESH_SECRET: ${JWT_REFRESH_SECRET:?JWT_REFRESH_SECRET is required}
      JWT_EXPIRES_IN: ${JWT_EXPIRES_IN:-15m}
      JWT_REFRESH_EXPIRES_IN: ${JWT_REFRESH_EXPIRES_IN:-7d}
      OLLAMA_BASE_URL: http://ollama:11434
      OLLAMA_MODEL: ${OLLAMA_MODEL:-llama3.2}
      CORS_ORIGIN: ${CORS_ORIGIN:-http://localhost:3000}
      UPLOAD_DIR: /app/uploads
      MAX_FILE_SIZE: ${MAX_FILE_SIZE:-10485760}
      RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW_MS: ${RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW_MS:-900000}
      RATE_LIMIT_MAX_REQUESTS: ${RATE_LIMIT_MAX_REQUESTS:-100}
    ports:
      - "${BACKEND_PORT:-3001}:3001"
    volumes:
      - backend_uploads:/app/uploads
      - backend_logs:/app/logs
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
      redis:
        condition: service_healthy
      ollama:
        condition: service_started
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "curl -f http://localhost:3001/health || exit 1"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 40s
    networks:
      - dateapp-network

  # Next.js Frontend
  frontend:
    build:
      context: ../frontend
      dockerfile: ../docker/Dockerfile.frontend
      args:
        NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
        NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL: ${NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL:-http://localhost:3001}
        NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL: ${NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL:-ws://localhost:3001}
        NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME: ${NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME:-DateApp}
    container_name: dateapp-frontend
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: ${NODE_ENV:-production}
      NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL: ${NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL:-http://localhost:3001}
      NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL: ${NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL:-ws://localhost:3001}
      NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME: ${NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME:-DateApp}
    ports:
      - "${FRONTEND_PORT:-3000}:3000"
    depends_on:
      backend:
        condition: service_healthy
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "curl -f http://localhost:3000 || exit 1"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 60s
    networks:
      - dateapp-network

  # Nginx Reverse Proxy
  nginx:
    image: nginx:alpine
    container_name: dateapp-nginx
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "${NGINX_HTTP_PORT:-80}:80"
      - "${NGINX_HTTPS_PORT:-443}:443"
    volumes:
      - ./nginx/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro
      - ./nginx/conf.d:/etc/nginx/conf.d:ro
      - ./nginx/ssl:/etc/nginx/ssl:ro
      - nginx_logs:/var/log/nginx
      - ./nginx/html:/usr/share/nginx/html:ro
    depends_on:
      frontend:
        condition: service_healthy
      backend:
        condition: service_healthy
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "nginx", "-t"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 10s
    networks:
      - dateapp-network

networks:
  dateapp-network:
    driver: bridge
    ipam:
      config:
        - subnet: 172.28.0.0/16

volumes:
  postgres_data:
    driver: local
  redis_data:
    driver: local
  ollama_data:
    driver: local
  backend_uploads:
    driver: local
  backend_logs:
    driver: local
  nginx_logs:
    driver: local
"}

# Multi-stage build for production optimization

# ============================================
# Stage 1: Dependencies
# ============================================
FROM node:20-alpine AS deps

# Install build dependencies for native modules
RUN apk add --no-cache libc6-compat python3 make g++

WORKDIR /app

# Copy package files
COPY package*.json ./
COPY yarn.lock* ./
COPY pnpm-lock.yaml* ./

# Install dependencies based on lockfile
RUN \
  if [ -f yarn.lock ]; then yarn install --frozen-lockfile --production=false; \
  elif [ -f pnpm-lock.yaml ]; then corepack enable pnpm && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile; \
  elif [ -f package-lock.json ]; then npm ci; \
  else npm install; \
  fi

# ============================================
# Stage 2: Builder
# ============================================
FROM node:20-alpine AS builder

WORKDIR /app

# Copy dependencies from deps stage
COPY --from=deps /app/node_modules ./node_modules
COPY . .

# Generate Prisma client if prisma schema exists
RUN if [ -f prisma/schema.prisma ]; then npx prisma generate; fi

# Build TypeScript if tsconfig exists
RUN \
  if [ -f tsconfig.json ]; then npm run build; \
  fi

# Prune dev dependencies
RUN \
  if [ -f yarn.lock ]; then yarn install --frozen-lockfile --production; \
  elif [ -f pnpm-lock.yaml ]; then corepack enable pnpm && pnpm prune --prod; \
  elif [ -f package-lock.json ]; then npm ci --only=production; \
  else npm prune --production; \
  fi

# ============================================
# Stage 3: Production Runner
# ============================================
FROM node:20-alpine AS runner

# Set environment
ARG NODE_ENV=production
ENV NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV}

# Install runtime dependencies
RUN apk add --no-cache \
  curl \
  dumb-init \
  && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*

# Create non-root user for security
RUN addgroup --system --gid 1001 nodejs \
  && adduser --system --uid 1001 nodeuser

WORKDIR /app

# Copy built application
COPY --from=builder --chown=nodeuser:nodejs /app/node_modules ./node_modules
COPY --from=builder --chown=nodeuser:nodejs /app/dist ./dist
COPY --from=builder --chown=nodeuser:nodejs /app/package.json ./package.json

# Copy Prisma files if they exist
COPY --from=builder --chown=nodeuser:nodejs /app/prisma ./prisma

# Create necessary directories
RUN mkdir -p /app/uploads /app/logs \
  && chown -R nodeuser:nodejs /app/uploads /app/logs

# Set user
USER nodeuser

# Expose port
EXPOSE 3001

# Health check
HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=10s --start-period=40s --retries=3 \
  CMD curl -f http://localhost:3001/health || exit 1

# Use dumb-init to handle signals properly
ENTRYPOINT ["dumb-init", "--"]

# Start the application
CMD ["node", "dist/index.js"]
"}
[Tool: Write] {"file_path":"C:/Users/joshl/date-app/docker/Dockerfile.frontend","content":"# Frontend Dockerfile for Next.js Application
# Multi-stage build for production optimization

# ============================================
# Stage 1: Dependencies
# ============================================
FROM node:20-alpine AS deps

# Install libc6-compat for Alpine compatibility
RUN apk add --no-cache libc6-compat

WORKDIR /app

# Copy package files
COPY package*.json ./
COPY yarn.lock* ./
COPY pnpm-lock.yaml* ./

# Install dependencies based on lockfile
RUN \
  if [ -f yarn.lock ]; then yarn install --frozen-lockfile; \
  elif [ -f pnpm-lock.yaml ]; then corepack enable pnpm && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile; \
  elif [ -f package-lock.json ]; then npm ci; \
  else npm install; \
  fi

# ============================================
# Stage 2: Builder
# ============================================
FROM node:20-alpine AS builder

WORKDIR /app

# Copy dependencies
COPY --from=deps /app/node_modules ./node_modules
COPY . .

# Set build-time environment variables
ARG NODE_ENV=production
ARG NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL
ARG NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL
ARG NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME

ENV NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV}
ENV NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=${NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL}
ENV NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL=${NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL}
ENV NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME=${NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME}
ENV NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1

# Build the application
RUN npm run build

# ============================================
# Stage 3: Production Runner
# ============================================
FROM node:20-alpine AS runner

WORKDIR /app

# Set environment
ARG NODE_ENV=production
ENV NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV}
ENV NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1

# Install runtime dependencies
RUN apk add --no-cache \
  curl \
  dumb-init \
  && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*

# Create non-root user for security
RUN addgroup --system --gid 1001 nodejs \
  && adduser --system --uid 1001 nextjs

# Copy public assets
COPY --from=builder /app/public ./public

# Set correct permissions for prerender cache
RUN mkdir .next \
  && chown nextjs:nodejs .next

# Copy standalone build (if using output: 'standalone')
# Uncomment these lines if using standalone mode in next.config.js
# COPY --from=builder --chown=nextjs:nodejs /app/.next/standalone ./
# COPY --from=builder --chown=nextjs:nodejs /app/.next/static ./.next/static

# Copy full .next build (standard mode)
COPY --from=builder --chown=nextjs:nodejs /app/.next ./.next
COPY --from=builder --chown=nextjs:nodejs /app/node_modules ./node_modules
COPY --from=builder --chown=nextjs:nodejs /app/package.json ./package.json

# Set runtime environment variables
ARG NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL
ARG NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL
ARG NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME

ENV NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=${NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL}
ENV NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL=${NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL}
ENV NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME=${NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME}

# Switch to non-root user
USER nextjs

# Expose port
EXPOSE 3000

# Set hostname for container
ENV HOSTNAME="0.0.0.0"
ENV PORT=3000

# Health check
HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=10s --start-period=60s --retries=3 \
  CMD curl -f http://localhost:3000 || exit 1

# Use dumb-init to handle signals properly
ENTRYPOINT ["dumb-init", "--"]

# Start Next.js
CMD ["npm", "start"]
"}
